players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice, you are the only one who can be mafia. Bob is innocent."
Bob: "I think Charlie is mafia, Alice is innocent."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Charlie knows I'm detective, so they can't trust me. Bob's support is suspicious."
You: "Charlie, you know I'm detective. If you were innocent you'd admit. Since you didn't, you must be mafia. Vote for Charlie."
Bob: "I think Charlie is mafia, Alice is innocent."
Charlie: "Alice, you are the only one who can be mafia. Bob is innocent. I suspect you are lying about your investigation."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested
